name: Backend for Mobile Apps
description: A simple, Heroku-deployabble backend that you can use to demo our mobile apps.

PAYSTACK_SECRET_KEY.description: Your secret key is at https://dashboard.paystack.co/#/settings/developer (it will start with sk_)

SAMPLE_EMAIL.description: A sample email with which to initialize all dummy transactions (must be a valid email)

TEST_AMOUNT.description: An amount (in naira) with which to initialize all dummy transactions, defaults to 25naira. Will be ignored if less than 25.
